vampire.editor.plugin.api.domain.sheet.view

Interface ValueViewAttributesAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, PublicCloneable, java.io.Serializable

    public interface ValueViewAttributesAPI
extends PublicCloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Provides read-only access to the view attributes of a value.
    Author:
    rex_victor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValueViewAttributesAPI clone()
      Returns a deep copy of this ValueViewAttributesAPI.
      int getCircles()
      Returns the number of circles to be shown.
      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the circles.
      boolean isDynamic()
      Returns if circles can be added during runtime.
      boolean isShowSpace()
      Returns if a space shall be shown after the first 5 circles.
      boolean isTempSquared()
      Returns if the temporary value shall be displayed as squares.
